page.text: 7543 Hawk Ridge, Missouri City, TX 77459 Phone: (201) 761-9584
Seeking employment which will allow me to grow professionally, while being able to utilize my strong
organizational, educational, and exceptional people skills.

text.b: Rutgers University, New Brunswick, NJ, May 2012

page.text: Major: B.A., Communications

Leadership Development (Awarded by Office of Fraternity and Sorority Affairs during terms as President)
Assisted with Marketing/Public Relation objectives and Game-Day Coordination
Handled requests from customers, clients, and promotional partners in and out of games and events
Initiated strategies to improve the team’s image within the community through local and social media
In charge of updating: events-calendar, program agendas, press kits, and databases
Acted as liaison between Management, Staff, and Chefs for events for 100-600 people
Decorated, set-up, break down and reorganize hall for events
Coordinated menus between the chefs, management, host, and staff before each event
Managed teams of 4-15 waiters every party and make sure they know the game plan for any specific party
Assisted with Marketing and supported sales-team in order to grow clientele
Contacted top executives of loan-lending banks to obtain information and make initial sales pitch
Created press releases and updated blogs which are featured on Biz2Credit.com
Organized all new research done on private banks and cross-referenced with sales-team

text.b: Verizon Wireless, Jersey City, NJ May 2008-August 2008

page.text: Communicated with new and returning customers to increase profit margins and acquire new paying contracts

Implemented communication theories to sales routine to increase personal profits 200%
Trained new employees strategies to sell over quota of $200 per day and to maximize profits on each sale
